title: Replace a Vehicle on an Auto Policy
description: A customer sold their old car and bought a new one, and needs to update their auto policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and the vehicle to be removed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and the old vehicle.

tasks.description: Collect the new vehicle's information (make, model, year, VIN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the new vehicle's details.

tasks.description: Update the policy by removing the old vehicle and adding the new one, then recalculate the premium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the policy and informs the customer of the new premium.
